channel.title: Dynamics CRM on David Triana
channel.description: Recent content in Dynamics CRM on David Triana

item.title: CCA Hosted Controls and Focus
item.description: Scenario CCA R2 for Dynamics CRM 2011 A non global dynamic hosted control whose panel is the main panel A workflow step that produce changes on that hosted control Use case The user is in a session, start a workflow that activates the hosted application. The user choose other application from the main panel. The user start a workflow step that interacts with the hosted application and expects the application to get focus in the main panel.
